DOC.brief_summary: Cross-sectional study of potential triggers for flares of Crohn's disease or ulcerative colitis.
DOC.brief_title: Exacerbating Factors in Inflammatory Bowel Disease
DOC.detailed_description: Detailed questionnaires with patient in regards to potential triggers for flares of IBD. Includes both patients with flares and those in remission as a control group.
DOC.criteria: History of verified Crohn's disease or ulcerative colitis unwilling to participate
